location: Nantes, Pays de la Loire, France
title: Centre place Graslin - Private room La Cambronne
description: Enjoy an elegant 20 m2 private room in a renovated 160 m2 apartment in the heart of Nantes city center in the very popular 'Graslin' district. The charm of the old renovated: ceiling height of 3.60 m, period parquet, black marble fireplace, comfortable bathroom.

title: Private garden, quiet, easy parking
description: This room with personal bathrooms, in an apartment renovate with quality materials,  to welcome you in the heart of Lyon. On the mythical Croix Rousse hill, nice surprises to discover await you. Quiet, charming, in a green setting: a real luxury.

title: Double room in lovely apartment
description: Hi I'm Valentina! I'm 31 and I'm an interior designer.I rent a room with a double bed in my cute apartment. I love sharing experiences, getting to know new people, and giving you helpful tips for your stay.The apartment is cozy, with everything you need. You can use all common areas as long as it is maintained with respect to the things of others. :) Please let me know if you have any questions!

title: Comfy room in modern apartment
description: A modern, comfortable room in the charming and peaceful neighbourhood of Seddon, just over fifteen minutes from the centre of Melbourne.

title: Silkhaus Modern 1 BDR | Unique Design | Downtown
description: Welcome to Silkhaus! This large and modern one bedroom is located at the edge of Downtown and Business Bay. It offers exclusive access to the building's resort-style amenities and is perfect for couples, business travelers, and even solo tourists. Enjoy privacy, complimentary WiFi, close proximity to popular attractions, and experience Dubai like a local.

title: Quality Furnishing & Expansive Harbour Views
description: Discover the best of Dubai, with this one-bedroom DIFC apartment with balcony views over the city. It’ll be easy to simply show up and start living in this contemporary Blueground furnished apartment with its fully-equipped kitchen, pretty living room, and our dedicated, on-the-ground support

title: Maison des Artistes
description: The Grand Canal glints below the terraces of this reimagined palazzo. The building features a shared reading area tucked under beams and a rooftop terrace with a bar. Local designer Umberto Branchini wrapped each of the 4 apartments in jewel-toned stucco, sleek millwork, and terrazzo floors. The San Polo location is close to churches and eateries, and a 20-minute walk from the Piazza San Marco.

title: Spacious Apartment With Panoramic Skyline Views
description: Welcome to Silkhaus! This large and modern one bedroom is located at the edge of Downtown and Business Bay. It offers exclusive access to the building's resort-style amenities and is perfect for couples, business travelers, and even solo tourists. Enjoy privacy, complimentary WiFi, close proximity to popular attractions, and experience Dubai like a local.

title: Apartment With tremendous Skyline Views
description: Welcome to Silkhaus! This large and modern one bedroom is located at the edge of Downtown and Business Bay. It offers exclusive access to the building's resort-style amenities and is perfect for couples, business travelers, and even solo tourists. Enjoy privacy, complimentary WiFi, close proximity to popular attractions, and experience Dubai like a local.

location: Cape Town, Western Cape, South Africa
title: UPS, Sea Views & Personalised Services
description: Three immaculate levels are yours to enjoy at this elegant Camps Bay home. Natural light oozes inside, igniting the sophisticated décor. Glass railings on the balcony allow unobstructed views of the Atlantic Ocean. Hike winding trails at Table Mountain, spend an afternoon at the beach, or settle in for a taste of local cuisine at a waterfront restaurant. After dark, the pool offers a starlit swim.

title: Siri Sala Private Thai Villa
description: Thai homes were the inspiration for this villa. Ponds, gardens & saltwater pool create a natural setting that pay tribute to traditional waterside homes on stilts. The 3 modern 'ruens' or thai houses sharing a common courtyard are complemented by a reconstructed wooden heritage house, and all feature original details like murals and reclaimed teak furniture. The best of Bangkok is reachable by car or boat through the property's private pier. Featured in major travel & design publications.

title: Arty & Luxurious flat at Opéra
description: For a truly Parisian experience, this artistic villa shows off the depth of design for which France is famous. Overlooking a European-style courtyard, this bright apartment enjoys frescoed ceilings, parquet flooring, and an eclectic mix of art and designer furnishings throughout. In the neighbourhood, you will find beautiful parks, bakeries, restaurants, and high-end fashion houses.
